IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ENABLE AND EMPOWER STUDENTS WITH LANGUAGE-BASED LEARNING DISABILITIES TO REALIZE THEIR EDUCATIONAL AND SOCIAL POTENTIAL THROUGH AN EXEMPLARY SCHOOL PROGRAM COMPLEMENTED BY OUTREACH AND TRAINING, DIAGNOSIS AND RESEARCH.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ENABLE AND EMPOWER STUDENTS WITH LANGUAGE-BASED LEARNING DISABILITIES TO REALIZE THEIR EDUCATIONAL AND SOCIAL POTENTIAL THROUGH AN EXEMPLARY SCHOOL PROGRAM COMPLEMENTED BY OUTREACH AND TRAINING, DIAGNOSIS AND RESEARCH.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDING EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS TO OVER 450 LEARNING- DISABLED AND DYSLEXIC CHILDREN IN ELEMENARY, MIDDLE AND HIGH SCHOOL PROGRAMS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: STATED IN ALL SCHOOL LITERATURE. SCHOOL PARTICIPATES IN ASSOCIATION OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS OF NEW ENGLAND (AISNE) ANNUAL PUBLIC REAFFIRMATION POLICY STATEMENT ON NON-DISCRIMINATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE J, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ROBERT BROUDO 0 36,000 0 MARK BRISLIN 0 18,000 0 CAROLYN OSINI-NELSON 0 6,000 0 DAVID SEITER 0 6,000 0 DAN AHEARN 0 8,500 0
CATHERINE SLARK MARTIN SLARK TUSTEE V. CHAIRMAN HUSBAND & WIFE

THE ORGANIZATION'S FORM 990 IS PREPARED AND REVIEWED BY AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTING FIRM. THE FORM IS THEN PRESENTED TO MANAGEMENT FOR REVIEW. A COPY IS THEN MADE AVAILABLE TO THE FINANCE COMMITTEE, IN ORDER TO REVIEW, COMMENT AND RECOMMEND CHANGES TO THE FORM 990 PRIOR TO THE FILING.

ALL DIRECTORS, OFFICERS AND MANAGEMENT ARE COVERED UNDER THE SCHOOL'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. CONFLICTS ARE REQUIRED TO BE DISCLOSED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OR COMMITTEE AUTHORIZED BY THE BOARD TO REVIEW AND APPROVE THE CONTRACT OR TRANSACTION. ON OR BEFORE THE FIRST MEETING OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS EACH FISCAL YEAR, EACH DIRECTOR AND OFFICER SHALL PROVIDE TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS A DISCLOSURE STATEMENT OF ALL INTERESTED TRANSACTIONS WITH THE SCHOOL INVOLVING THE DIRECTOR OR OFFICER, IN SUCH FORM AS THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS MAY FROM TIME TO TIME SPECIFY.

COMPENSATION FOR THE SCHOOL'S HEAD OF SCHOOL IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. IN DETERMINING THE COMPENSATION FOR THIS POSITION, CONSIDERATION IS GIVEN TO COMPENSATION PAID TO SIMILAR POSITIONS IN SCHOOL'S OF COMPARABLE SIZE AND DEMOGRAPHICS, ALONG WITH THE OVERALL FINANCIAL HEALTH AND OUTLOOK OF THE SCHOOL.
THE SCHOOL WILL CONSIDER FURNISHING FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, POLICY AND GOVERNING DOCUMENTS TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
